    • generateQrCode

      protected String generateQrCode(ChEmedEprDocumentPmlc pmlcDocument) throws EMediplanPdfMedicationCardGenerator.QrCodeGenerationException
      Gets the eMediplan QR code for the PMLC document content.
      Parameters:
      pmlcDocument - The PMLC document for which to generate the eMediplan QR code.
      Returns:
      The Base64-encoded PNG image render of the QR code, as a string.
      Throws:
      EMediplanPdfMedicationCardGenerator.QrCodeGenerationException - In case of error either transforming the PMLC to a eMediplan format or while generating the QR code itself.
